name: Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria with Angioedema
chief_complaint: I keep getting itchy hives and my lips swell up randomly
treatment: Consideration of omalizumab for refractory cases
prognosis: Variable - may persist for years but often resolves spontaneously; quality of life can be significantly impacted during active disease
description: A chronic form of urticaria lasting >6 weeks with associated angioedema, without identifiable external trigger. Believed to involve autoimmune mechanisms with mast cell activation. Diagnosis requires exclusion of other causes of chronic urticaria.
